briefTitle: A Safety and Efficacy Study of a New Eye Drop Formulation in Patients With Dry Eye Disease.
officialTitle: A Multicenter, Double-masked, Randomized Study to Compare the Safety and Efficacy of the OM3 Tear Formulation With REFRESH OPTIVE® ADVANCED Unit Dose for 3 Months in Patients With Dry Eye Disease
summary: This study will evaluate the safety and efficacy of a new eye drop formulation in patients with dry eye disease.

primaryOutcome.measure: Change From Baseline in the Ocular Surface Disease Index© (OSDI©) Score
